name: Kashef Sensor Suite
desc: A widely-available piece of Mayorate military hardware, the Kashef Sensor Suite increases combat sensor range by %s percent and effective weapon range by %s percent. Campaign sensor strength is increased by %s.

name: AI Command Shunts
desc: Installation of a delta-level combat AI and associated command-and-control shunts improves weapon autofire targeting by %s percent, and engine acceleration curves by %s percent. The increase in complexity to ship systems lengthens combat and campaign-level repair times by %s.
